name: Babysitter Simulator
description:
But how much do you like children?
Babysitter Simulator is a casual game which prepares you for mature life! Your mission seems simple at first sight, but it is not so.

You should be the babysitter of 2 children, Emma and Liam. Together with them, you will learn to be a real babysitter, because you will must to learn them, wash, cook for them and many more.

Game features :
- A lot of babysitting activities like playing,washing,cooking,learning kids
- 2 Kids that need attention
- Parental sensations
